TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: ORDER_ID = ORDER_ID1 AND EMP_ID = EMP_ID1 AND RETAILER_ID = RETAILER_ID1 AND PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCT_ID1 AND CUSTOMER_ID = CUST_ID AND SALES_DATE_ID = DATE_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE(true, isnull(SALES_ID),'insert' , ORDER_ID!=ORDER_ID1 or EMP_ID != EMP_ID1 or RETAILER_ID!=RETAILER_ID1 or PRODUCT_ID!=PRODUCT_ID1 or CUSTOMER_ID!=CUST_ID or SALES_DATE_ID!=DATE_ID,'update', 'NoChange')
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: IU_FLAG

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
